name: Tumblr Dashboard Theme - Dark Grey and Blue
description: Simple dark blue and grey theme made for myself, but thought I'd share. All feedback welcomed.

user.name: Jitaroo
user.about: Hi, I'm Jitaroo, I write codes for various sites out of personal interest. Not a serious coder when it comes to these styles but I hope you like anything I happen to produce. :3 Donations are greatly appreciated.

additional_info: - UPDATES 14/01/2012- Code updated to work a bit better with all pages, some pages will have default white content background from now on so as to make sure the text is clear.
